text: Gaston Sindimwo (born 1965) is a Burundian politician who served as First Vice President of Burundi from 2015 to 2020.https://www.presidence.gov.bi/le- president/les-vice-presidents/m-gaston-sindimwo/ He is also the Secretary General of the Union for National Progress (UPRONA). Sindimwo previously served as Deputy Chief of Staff to the First Vice President. He unsuccessfully ran for President of Burundi in the 2020 Burundian general election, finishing third of seven candidates. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Vice-Presidents of Burundi Category:Union for National Progress politicians Category:People from Bujumbura
title: Gaston Sindimwo
